Class KhazadSpi

java.lang.Object
  javax.crypto.CipherSpi
      gnu.crypto.jce.cipher.CipherAdapter

public final class KhazadSpi
extends CipherAdapter

The implementation of the Khazad Service Provider Interface (SPI) adapter.

$Revision: 1.5 $
